properties.name: items
properties.doc: The items in the page

properties.name: id
properties.doc: The item's unique id

properties.name: title
properties.doc: The item's title

properties.name: createdBy
properties.doc: User that created the todo

properties.name: assignedTo
properties.doc: User that the todo is assigned to

properties.name: description
properties.doc: A longer description of the todo item in markdown format

properties.name: status
properties.doc: The status of the todo item

properties.name: createdAt
properties.doc: When the todo item was created.

properties.name: updatedAt
properties.doc: When the todo item was last updated

properties.name: completedAt
properties.doc: When the todo item was makred as completed

properties.name: pageSize
properties.doc: The number of items returned in this page

properties.name: totalSize
properties.doc: The total number of items

properties.name: prevLink
properties.doc: A link to the previous page, if it exists

properties.name: nextLink
properties.doc: A link to the next page, if it exists

properties.name: code
properties.doc: A machine readable error code

properties.name: message
properties.doc: A human readable message

properties.name: filename
properties.doc: The file name of the attachment

properties.name: mediaType
properties.doc: The media type of the attachment

properties.name: contents
properties.doc: The contents of the file

properties.name: title
properties.doc: The item's title

properties.name: assignedTo
properties.doc: User that the todo is assigned to

properties.name: description
properties.doc: A longer description of the todo item in markdown format

properties.name: status
properties.doc: The status of the todo item

properties.name: id
properties.doc: An autogenerated unique id for the user

properties.name: username
properties.doc: The user's username

properties.name: email
properties.doc: The user's email address

properties.name: password
properties.doc:
The user's password, provided when creating a user
but is otherwise not visible (and hashed by the backend)

properties.name: token
properties.doc: The token to use to construct the validate email address url

models.name: InvalidUserResponse
models.doc: The user is invalid (e.g. forgot to enter email address)

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.doc: Body parameter's content type. Known values are application/json

parameters.name: limit
parameters.doc: The limit to the number of items

parameters.name: offset
parameters.doc: The offset to start paginating at
